overview:
Dan is the Founder and CEO of Transit Treasure. Transit Treasure is a first-of-its-kind loyalty rewards program for users of public transportation. Members of our free program earn valuable rewards points for their use of public transit and their spending with participating merchant partners (online and off, local and national). Points earned are redeemable for transit fare credit and cash back. He is focused on delivering a valuable and rewarding experience to all Transit Treasure members.

In 2012, Dan also founded two additional companies, Bid4MyTradeIn.com and NfusionNYC.

Bid4MyTradeIn.com offers consumers seeking to trade in their vehicle a safe, secure alternative to private selling that guarantees they receive top dollar for their trade. For our participating dealers, we bring the trade in process online and deliver high-quality new vehicle purchase leads and help stock used inventory.

NfusionNYC is New York City’s first in-home, on-demand re-hydration, re-energizing and re-vitalization service. Our highly skilled nurse practitioners, under the direction and oversight of a NY State licensed medical doctor, provide safe, comfortable and highly effective intravenous re-hydration therapy to our customers.
